abstract: Now you can run your company from Starbucks. Amazon's A.W.S. and SAP join forces to offer lots of corporate software, from H.R. and customer management to analytics, via the cloud. It's part of the steady, and increasingly powerful, ratcheting up of services from cloud computing providers.

headline.main: How to Run Your (Not Small) Company Off of a Laptop
